verses.content: Chuongchun, Joab chu an hril a, “Ngai ta, lal chun Absalom chu a ṭah a, a sûn ie,” an ta.
Chuongchun, chu nia an hnena chu mi po po ta dinga sûnna a lo ni ta lem a; “Lal chu a naupa lei chun a lungngai nasa khawp el a,” an ti chu mipui chun chu ni chun an lo hriet ta sih a.
Chun, mipuihai chu indonaa mi an tlânsieh a, an inzak a, inrûka an fe hmang angin chu ni chun a rûkin khawpuia chun an lût a.
Chun, lal chun a hmai a hup a, “Aw ka naupa Absalom, Aw Absalom, ka naupa, ka naupa,” tiin lal chu a ṭap a ṭap a.
Chun, Joab chu inah lal kuoma chun a lût a, “I hringna dâm, i nau- pahai le i naunuhai hringna dâm, i nuhmeihai le i thaikêmhai sanhim- tuhai chu vawisûn hin inzaktakin i siem ta hi;

nangma hmangaituhai che i theidah a, nangma theidatuhai che chu i hmangai tlata hin. Hotuhai le sipaihai chu i ta dinga iengkhawm ni lo angin vawisûn hin i suklang tah a; Absalom chu dam sienla, keini po po hi vawisûn hin thi ta vawng ni inlang, chu chu i lâwm zâwngtak ni âwmin vawisûn hin ka hriet a nih.

Chuleiin tho la, suok el rawh, i mihai suklungawi zâwngtakin thu hril rawh, i suok naw chun LALPA sâlin ṭawng kân khâm a nih; mi pakhat khawm vawizân hin i kuoma um um naw ni hai; chun, chu chu i ta dingin i tleirâwla inthawka tu chena i chunga thil ṭha naw hung tlung po pohai nêk hmanin ṭha naw lem a tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, lal chu a tho a, kul kawtkhâra chun a ṭhung a; “Ngai ta u, lal chu kul kawtkhâra chun a ṭhung a,” tiin mipui po po chu an hril a; chun, mipui po po chu lal hmaa chun an va fe tah a.

Israelhai ruok chu anni puon in sengah an fe tah a. “Lal chun ei hmêlmahai kuta inthawkin a mi sansuok a, Philistin mihai kuta inthawkin a mi sandam tah a; chun, tuhin hi rama inthawk hin Absalom chu a tlân hmangsan a.
Chun, Absalom ei lal dinga hriek ei nâl chu indonaah a thi tah sih a, iengdinga lal chu baukhat bêka a ko kîr zâi in rêl naw am a ni leh?” tiin Israel mi po pohai chu an insêl ta mur mur el a.

Chuongchun, lal David chun thiempu Zadok le Abiathar kuoma chun, “Juda upahai kuoma chun, ‘Iengdinga lal chu a in tienga ṭhuoi kîr ding thuah a muongtaka ṭhang am in nih a? Israel mihaiin lal ṭhuoi kîr ding thu an hril chu lal kuom a tlung ta sih a.
Ka unauhai in na, ka ru le ka tisa in ni sih a, iengdinga a muong- taka ṭhang am in ni leh aw?’ tiin hril ro.

Chun, Amasa kuomah, ‘Ka ru le ka tisa i ni naw am a nih? Joab aia ka hmaa sipaihai hotua ka siem nawtâk che leh Pathienin a law law mi law el raw se, chu nêka nasa khawmin,’ a tih a, va ti ro,” tiin mi a tir a.
Chuongchun, Judahai po po lungril chu mi pakhat lungril ang elin a sukthle ta duol a; chuongchun, lal kuomah, “I mihai po po le khan hung kîr nâwk ro,” ti dingin mi an tir tah a.
Chuongchun, lal chu a kîr nâwk a, Jordan a va tlung a. Chun, Judahai chu lal lo tuok a, lal chu Jordan lo ṭhuoikai dingin Gilgala chun an feh a.
Chun, Bahurim khuoa mi Ben- jamin mi Gera naupa Simei chu in- hmawtakin lal David tuok ding chun Judahai ruolin a hung thla veh a.
Chun, a kuoma chun Benjamin mi sâng le, Saula sûnghai siehlaw, Ziba, a naupasalhai sâwm le panga le, a siehlaw sâwmhnihai leh an ṭhang ve a; chun, lal mithmua chun Jordan chu an kai a.
Chun, lal sûnghai ṭhuoikaina ding le ṭha a ti ang anga hmang dingin lawng an fepui a. Chun, Jordan vadung a hei kai chun Gera naupa Simei chu lal hmaa chun a bawkkhup a.

Chun, lal kuoma chun, “Ka lalpa chun khawhlona neiah mi ruot naw hrâm sienla, lalpa ka puin Jerusalem a suoksan nia i siehlaw hin indik nawtaka a lo thaw tahai kha hre zing bawk naw la, lal chun lungrilah vawn zing naw raw se.
I siehlaw hin thil ka lo suksuol ti kân hriet a; chuleiin, ngai ta, Josef sûng po pohai laia ka pu lal chu tuok dingin vawisûn hin a hung thla hmasa tak ka hung ni nghe nghe annaw,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Zeruia naupa Abisai chun a dawn a, “LALPA hriek- nâl chu ṭawngsie ân phur leiin Simei hi sukhlum ding a ni naw ding am a nih?” a ta.

Chun, David chun, “Nangni Ze- ruia naupasalhai, nangni hin in mi lo hriet pêk ding ieng am a um a? Vawi- sûn hin a mi dotuhai in ni naw am a nih? Vawisûn hin Israel mihai laia mi hrim hrim sukhlum ding am a nih? Vawisûn hi Israel mihai chunga lal ka ni hi ka hriet naw am a nih?” a ta.
Chun, lal chun Simei kuoma chun, “Thi naw tawp i tih,” a ta. Chun, lal chun a kuomah ṭawng ân khâm tah a.

Chun, Saula naupa Mephi- boseth chu lal tuok dingin a hung thlah a; lal a fe suoka râlmuonga a hung kîr nâwk ni chen chun a kehai chu a chei nawh a, a khâkhmul chu a chep ruol bawk nawh a, a puonhai khawm chu a sâwp nawh a.
Chun, lal tuok dinga Jerusa- lema a fe chun lal chun a kuomah, “Mephiboseth, iengdinga ka kuoma i fe ve naw am?” a ta.
Chun, ama chun a dawn a, “Aw, lalpa ka pu, ka siehlawin a mi hlêm a nih; i siehlaw hin, ‘Lal kuoma ka fena dingin sabengtung chei ka tih,’ ka tih a, i siehlaw hi ka ke ân bâi sih a.
Chun, lalpa ka pu kuoma hin i siehlaw hi a hêk a, nisienlakhawm, lalpa ka pu chu Pathien vântirko ang a na, chuleiin ṭha i ti ang angin thaw el rawh.

Ka pa sûnghai po po chu lalpa ka pu hmaa chun sukhlum vawng âwm an na, nisienlakhawm, i siehlaw hi i buthlêng awtpuituhai lai ân ṭhangtir a. Chuleichun, lal kuoma hin thil dang phût ngam âwm khawm am ka ni ta?” a ta.
Chun, lal chun a kuomah, “I chungchâng thu hi iengdinga i hril nâwk hlak am? Nang le Ziba chun ram chu insem ro ka ti a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Mephiboseth chun lal kuomah, “E, amân nei vawng el raw se, lalpa ka pu chu inah râlmuongin a hung tlung ta sih a,” a ta.
Chun, Gilead mi Barzillai chu Rogelim-a inthawkin a hung thlah a, lal chun Jordana ṭhuoikai dingin a kuomah Jordan a kai veh a.
Barzillai chu upatak a na, kum sâwmriet mi zet a nih; Mahanaima lal um sûng khan fâk ding dâm a lo tumpêk a, mi neinungtak a nih.
Chun, lal chun Barzillai kuoma chun, “Ka kuoma fe ve la, ka kuomah Jerusalemah châwm ka ti che,” a ta.
Chun, Barzillai chun lal kuom- ah, “Ieng chen tak am la damin lal kuoma Jerusalema chun hang fe vêng ka ta?

Tuhin kum sâwmriet mi ka na, a sie le ṭha khawm thlier thei am ka la nih? I siehlaw hin ka thil fâk le dâwn hi ân hnik naw khawm ka hriet hran thei ta am a nih? Nuhmei le pasal hla sak ri khawm ka hriet hran thei ta am a nih? Chuleiin, i siehlaw hi iengdingin am ka pu ta ding hin phurrik ni el ka ta?
I siehlaw hin lal kuoma Jordan râl kai ve chau hi ka tum a nih; iengdingin am lal chun chuong ang chun ṭhat man chu mi thung ve kher a ta?

Lunginsiettakin i siehlaw hi mîn fetir nâwk el la, ka nu le pa thlân umna keini khuo ngeiah thi de ning. Amiruokchu, en ta, i siehlaw Kim- ham hi, lalpa ka pu kuomah fe ve sienla, a chungah ṭha i ti ang angin thaw rawh,” a ta.
Chun, lal chun a dawn a, “Kim- ham chu ka kuomah fe vêng a tih, ṭha i ti ang peiin a chungah thâwng ka tih; chun, thil iengkhawm i mi hni ta- phawt chu thawpêk pei ka ti che,” a ta.
Chun, mipui po pohai chu Jordan râl an kai a; chun, lal khawm chu a kai veh a; chun, lal chun Barzil- lai chu a fâwp a, mal a sâwm a; chun, ama hmun tieng a fe nâwk tah a.
Chuongchun, lal chu Gilgala chun a kai a. Kimham chu a kuoma chun a kai ve a; chun, Juda mi po pohai chun lal chu an ṭhuoi kai a; Israel mi khawm a zâtve an ṭhang.

Chun, Israel mi po po chu lal kuomah an hung a, lal kuoma chun, “Iengdinga kan unau Juda mihai hin an chang bîk cheh a, lal le a sûnghai le David mihai po po khawm Jordan râla an ṭhuoi sa vawng el?” an ta.

Chun, Juda mi po pohai chun Israel mihai chu an dawn a, “Lal chu keini tieng hnai a ni lei a nih, iengdinga hi thua hin in lunginsen el am? Lal nei ringa um am kan nih? Thilpêk ieng amani khawm a mi nei am a nih?” an ta.

Chun, Israel mihai chun Juda mihai chu an dawn a, “Lala hin chan sâwm kan nei a, Davida hin nangni nêkin chan kan nei lem a nih. Ieng- dinga in mi ngainêp el am a na? Lal ṭhuoikîr thu hi a rawt hmasatu kan ni naw am a nih?” an ta. Chuongchun, Juda mihai thu chu Israel mihai thu nêk chun ân rum ta lem a.
